summary: Dragging along her spineless boyfriend Johnny, hare-brained secretary Kitty O'Day is unstoppable as she tries to determine her boss's murderer. In her exuberance she and Johnny keep running... See full summary Â»
cast: Jean Parker|Peter Cookson|Tim Ryan|Lorna Gray|Jan Wiley|Ralph Sanford|William Forrest|Byron Foulger|Hugh Prosser|Dick Elliott|William Ruhl|Shelton Brooks|Kenner G. Kemp|Carl Mathews|Constance Purdy
title: Adventures of Kitty O'Day
